query.node: SELECT rsl.z_myid, rsl.z_mydesc, rsl.z_myhost, rsl.z_mylocate, rsl.z_svrmanufact, rsl.z_myos, rsl.z_svrmodel, rsl.z_svrserial, rsl.z_myip, rsl.z_regdt, rsc.z_descript AS sms_cpu_z_descript, rsm.z_totsize AS sms_mem_z_totsize, rsd.z_totsize AS sms_disk_z_totsize FROM rt_sms_list rsl left outer join (SELECT z_listid, z_descript || ' x ' || sum(z_threads) AS z_descript FROM rt_sms_moninvcpu group by z_descript, z_listid) rsc ON rsl.z_myid = rsc.z_listid left outer join rt_sms_moninvmem rsm ON rsl.z_myid = rsm.z_listid left outer join rt_sms_moninvdisk rsd ON rsl.z_myid = rsd.z_listid GROUP BY (rsl.z_myid, rsc.z_descript, rsm.z_totsize, rsd.z_totsize) ORDER BY rsl.z_myid
select z_myid, z_mydesc, z_myhost, z_contact, z_myloc, z_mymodel, z_serial, z_os, z_myip, z_totifnum, z_actifnum, z_version from rt_nms_list order by z_myid
select ci_id, ci_no, ci_name, ci_status, type_id, ci_desc, mapping_id from cmdb_ci where mapping_id in (?)
select ci_id, attribute_id, value from cmdb_ci_data where ci_id in (?)
select ci_id, attribute_id, c_attribute_id, c_attribute_seq, c_value from cmdb_ci_group_list_data where ci_id in (?)
select type_id, p_type_id, type_name, type_desc, type_alias, type_level, class_id, type_icon from cmdb_type where type_alias in (?)

select clam.class_id, ca.mapping_id, ca.attribute_id, ca.attribute_name, ca.attribute_desc, ca.attribute_type, ca.attribute_text, ca.attribute_value from cmdb_class_attribute_map clam inner join cmdb_attribute ca on clam.attribute_id = ca.attribute_id and clam.class_id in (?) order by clam.attribute_order
select ca.mapping_id, ca.attribute_id, ca.attribute_name, ca.attribute_desc, ca.attribute_type, ca.attribute_text, ca.attribute_value from cmdb_attribute ca where attribute_id in (?)
select ci_no from cmdb_ci where upper(ci_no) like upper('%?%') order by ci_no desc limit 1

with history as ( select ci.ci_id, coalesce(max(seq), 0) as seq from cmdb_ci ci left join cmdb_ci_history cch on ci.ci_id = cch.ci_id where ci.ci_id in (?) group by ci.ci_id ) select ci.ci_id, ci.ci_no, history.seq, ci.ci_name, ci.ci_status, ci_type.type_id , ci_type.class_id, ci_type.type_icon as ci_icon, ci.ci_desc, ci.interlink from cmdb_ci ci, cmdb_type ci_type, history history where ci.type_id = ci_type.type_id and ci.ci_id = history.ci_id and ci.ci_id in (?)

with history as ( select ci.ci_id, coalesce(max(seq), 0) as seq from cmdb_ci ci left join cmdb_ci_data_history data_history on ci.ci_id = data_history.ci_id where ci.ci_id in (?) group by ci.ci_id ) select ccd.ci_id, hi.seq, ca.attribute_id, ca.attribute_name, ca.attribute_desc , ca.attribute_type, ca.attribute_text, ca.attribute_value, ccd.value from cmdb_ci_data ccd, cmdb_attribute ca, history hi where ccd.attribute_id = ca.attribute_id and ccd.ci_id = hi.ci_id and ccd.ci_id in (?)

with history as ( select ci.ci_id, coalesce(max(seq), 0) as seq from cmdb_ci ci left join cmdb_ci_group_list_data_history group_list_data_history on ci.ci_id = group_list_data_history.ci_id where ci.ci_id in (?) group by ci.ci_id ) select ccgld.ci_id, hi.seq, ccgld.attribute_id, ca.attribute_id as c_attribute_id, ccgld.c_attribute_seq , ca.attribute_name as c_attribute_name, ca.attribute_desc as c_attribute_desc , ca.attribute_type as c_attribute_type, ca.attribute_text as c_attribute_text , ca.attribute_value as c_attribute_value, ccgld.c_value from cmdb_ci_group_list_data ccgld, cmdb_attribute ca, history hi where ccgld.c_attribute_id = ca.attribute_id and ccgld.ci_id = hi.ci_id and ccgld.ci_id in (?)
delete from cmdb_ci_data where ci_id = (?) and attribute_id = (?)
insert into cmdb_ci (ci_id, ci_no, ci_name, ci_desc, ci_status, type_id, interlink, mapping_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
update cmdb_ci set ci_no = ?, ci_name = ?, ci_desc = ?, ci_status = ?, type_id = ?, interlink = ? where ci_id = ? and mapping_id = ?
insert into cmdb_ci_data (ci_id, attribute_id, value) values (?, ?, ?)
insert into cmdb_ci_group_list_data (ci_id, attribute_id, c_attribute_id, c_attribute_seq, c_value) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
delete from cmdb_ci_group_list_data where ci_id = (?) and attribute_id = (?) and c_attribute_id = (?) and c_attribute_seq = (?)
insert into cmdb_ci_history (history_id, ci_id, seq, ci_no, ci_name, ci_status, type_id, class_id, ci_icon, ci_desc, interlink) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

insert into cmdb_ci_data_history (data_history_id, ci_id, seq, attribute_id, attribute_name, attribute_desc, attribute_type, attribute_text, attribute_value, value) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

insert into cmdb_ci_group_list_data_history (data_history_id, seq, ci_id, attribute_id, c_attribute_id, c_attribute_seq, c_attribute_name, c_attribute_desc, c_attribute_type, c_attribute_text, c_attribute_value, c_value) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
